name: Bird of the Black Death
description:
The year is 1347 and the Black Death has come ashore. You have been newly invited to join the local Plague Doctor Guild in an attempt to combat the lethal infections. People are dying left and right, and with all the other doctors having already been assigned to a town, it's your turn to prove yourself. Armed with a bag of change and supplies, you must join the front lines and fight the plague. But be forewarned, you are not immune to the plague yourself.

Make careful and wise decisions to best distribute your supplies, lest you or the town succumb to the Black Death.
